name: Psionic
description: Your brain has evolved to a whole new level. You can bend the forces of this world with just your power of will.

name: Psi - Harm
description: Using your psionic abilities you can disrupt metabolic processes in other living creatures' tissues causing serious harm. Robots and other non-living creatures are not affected.

name: Psi - Incinerate
description: Using your psionic abilities you can provoke destructive exothermal reactions in other living creatures' tissues effectively setting them on fire. Robots and other non-living creatures are not affected.

name: Psi - Push
description: You unleash a small wave of force in front you, pushing all nearby creatures back and damaging fragile constructions.

name: Psi - Shockwave
description: You emit a powerfull blast of force around yourself, throwing back all nearby creatures and damaging fragile constructions.
